name: rk3588-gstreamer-encoder
tagline: RK3588 MPP/NPU-friendly H.264/H.265 hardware encoder + RTSP
whatItDoes: Uses Rockchip MPP (rkmpp) via GStreamer to encode camera/video to RTSP with low CPU.
whyItSavesTime: Avoids manual rkmpp plumbing and kernel driver quirks; one env-config to stream reliably.
